member.name: T:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Kartris.includes.aesEncrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts input string using Rijndael (AES) algorithm with CBC blocking and PKCS7 padding.
member.remarks: The key and IV are the same, and use strEncryptionPassword.

member.name: M:Kartris.includes.aesDecrypt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts input string from Rijndael (AES) algorithm with CBC blocking and PKCS7 padding.
member.remarks: The key and IV are the same, and use strEncryptionPassword.

member.name: M:Kartris.includes.hexStringToBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string of characters representing hexadecimal values into an array of bytes
member.param: A hexadecimal string of characters to convert to binary.

member.name: M:Kartris.includes.byteArrayToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes into a hexadecimal string representation.
